title: ISic000147. Funerary inscription for P. Cestius Catullus
body:
Facsimile Images

((·)) P(ublius) ((·)) Cestius ((·))
((·)) Catullus ((·))
((·)) vix(it) ((·)) an(nis) ((·)) XVIII

Apparatus criticus

Text from autopsy

English translation

Publius Cestius Catullus lived 18 years.

commentary

There are a number of other Cestiae, including other Publii Cestii Catulli, in Thermae Himeraeae, see esp. ISic000144 and ISic000146.

bibliography

  • Romano 1829 300 no.7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002748
  • 10.7386 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • 66 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
